name: Take this "I Never Met the Dead Man" Quiz! Average Trivia | 'Family Guy' Seasons/Episodes

questions.text: Which vegetable does Stewie seek vengeance against in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Broccoli.

	Stewie vows to destroy the world's supply of broccoli, and he creates a weather device to assist himself.

questions.text: When Peter is watching "Star Trek", which captain is present?  Kirk or Picard?
questions.explanation:
Kirk.

	This question may be a little difficult if you don't watch "Star Trek" because I don't think the name is mentioned in this episode.  William Shatner, who plays the character of Captain Kirk, also appears in a later episode, although he doesn't voice his character.

questions.text: What does Peter promise Meg if she takes the fall for Peter's driving accident?
questions.explanation:
A convertible.

	Meg has to take the fall for Peter because he crashes into the Quahog Cable Transmitter, while he wasn't watching the road.

questions.text: When Peter talks to the sun, what rains down on Quahog?
questions.explanation:
Giant raisins.

	This gag is parodying the old Raisin Bran commercials.  In this parody, giant raisins land all over Spooner Street, and one crushes a car.

questions.text: Which of the listed activities do the Griffins not do when the cable is knocked out?
questions.explanation:
Go to the fair.

	When the family goes fishing they catch "The Creature from the Black Lagoon", and when they have a picnic, Peter is hit by a bull.  The family also plays basketball.

questions.text: When the cable is returned, what is on the Griffin family's TV?
questions.explanation:
Channel 5 News.

	The cable returns as anchorman Tom Tucker calls his wife a frigid old cow and prepares to spank his co-host, Diane Simmons.

questions.text: Who does Meg run over and kill in the car?
questions.explanation:
William Shatner.

	While running back barefoot from the Bavarian Folk Festival, Stewie changes the weather to freezing rain.  The road visibility changes and Meg runs over William Shatner, killing him.  She Also hits Peter and puts him in a full-body cast

questions.text: A commercial for what object makes Peter return to watching television?
questions.explanation:
Klondike Bar.

	The commercial parodies the Klondike Bar commercials where someone asks "what would you do for a Klondike Bar".  In this case the man killed for a Klondike Bar.

questions.text: Does Meg get her driver's license?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Meg gets her drivers license before the end of the episode, but Peter doesn't buy her a convertible.

questions.text: Does Cleveland appear in this episode?
questions.explanation:
No.

	During this episode, Cleveland neither appears nor has a speaking part.  Quagmire has a small speaking part.
